tldr: Affected versions of the package are vulnerable to a Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability, allowing an attacker to assign a script (e.g., `javascript:alert('XXX')`) to the `survey.navigateToUrl` property.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `survey-angular-ui` library to the patch version.
